import React from 'react'; import CustomInput from '../../components/CustomInput/custom-input.component'; import CustomButton from '../../components/CustomButton/custom-button.component'; import './create-business.styles.css'; class CreateBusiness extends React.Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state = { businessname: '', phoneno: '', rcNumber: '', businessowner: '', email: '', address: '', city: '', state: '', tag: [], category: '', lat: '', lng: '', registered: '' } } componentDidMount() { } onInputChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const { name, value } = event.target; this.setState({ [name]: value }) } addTag = (value) => { console.log(value) this.setState({ tag: this.state.tag.push(value)}); } handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state.tag[0]); } render() { return (
{ event.preventDefault(); this.addTag(event.target.value) }}/> Submit Details
); } } export default CreateBusiness;
